m_szDocTitle: Tesla Partner Nvidia's Q1 Sales Seen Speeding Faster Than Most | Stock News & Stock Market Analysis - IBD
m_szDocSumamry: Tesla Partner Nvidia's Q1 Sales Seen Speeding Faster Than Most (Nvidia) Reprints Wall Street expects Tesla Motors ( TSLA ) partner Nvidia ( NVDA ) to post double-digit sales growth for just the second time in the past six quarters, as well as its biggest earnings growth in five quarters, when the company reports Q1 earnings Thursday. Nvidia stock has zoomed since Feb. 12, up 40% since Facebook ( FB )-owned Oculus Rift released its first virtual-reality headset. Nvidia and rival Advanced Micro Devices ( AMD ) are the recommended graphics-chip providers for laptops that work with the headsets. N
